GK22bharst_u:1197: svātantryeṇa niraṅkuśaṃ viharaṇaṃ svāntaṃ praśāntaṃ sadā
GK22bharst_u:1198: sthairyaṃ yoga-mahotsave 'pi ca yadi trailokya-rājyena kim || BharSt_3.91 ||
GK22bharst_u:1200: śapharī-sphurtenābdhiḥ kṣubdho na khalu jāyate || BharSt_3.92 ||
GK22bharst_u:1201: mātar lakṣmi bhajasva kañcid aparaṃ mat-kāṅkṣiṇī mā sma bhūr
GK22bharst_u:1202: bhogeṣu spṛhayālavas tava vaśe kā niḥspṛhāṇām asi |
GK22bharst_u:1204: bhikṣā-vastubhir eva samprati vayaṃ vṛttiṃ samīhāmahe || BharSt_3.93 ||
GK22bharst_u:1208: sukhī śāntaḥ śete munir atanu-bhūtir nṛpa iva || BharSt_3.94 ||
GK22bharst_u:1213: caṇḍālaḥ kim ayaṃ dvijātir athavā śūdro 'tha kiṃ tāpasaḥ
GK22bharst_u:1214: kiṃ vā tattva-viveka-peśala-matir yogīśvaraḥ ko 'pi kim |
GK22bharst_u:1216: na kruddhāḥ pathi naiva tuṣṭa-manaso yānti svayaṃ yoginaḥ || BharSt_3.96 ||
GK22bharst_u:1220: tām anveṣayatāṃ prayānti satataṃ sarvaṃ samāptiṃ guṇāḥ || BharSt_3.97 ||
GK22bharst_u:1223: kiṃ tair bhāvyaṃ mama sudivasair yatra te nirviśaṅkāḥ
GK22bharst_u:1224: kaṇḍūyante jaraṭha-hariṇāḥ svāṅgam aṅge madīye || BharSt_3.98 ||
GK22bharst_u:1225: jīrṇāḥ kanthā tataḥ kiṃ sitam amala-paṭaṃ paṭṭa-sūtraṃ tataḥ kiṃ
GK22bharst_u:1226: ekā bhāryā tataḥ kiṃ haya-kari-sugaṇair āvṛto vā tataḥ kim |
GK22bharst_u:1227: bhaktaṃ bhuktaṃ tataḥ kiṃ kadaśanam athavā vāsarānte tataḥ kiṃ
GK22bharst_u:1228: vyakta-jyotir na vāntarmathita-bhava-bhayaṃ vaibhavaṃ vā tataḥ kim || BharSt_3.- ||
GK22bharst_u:1229: pāṇiḥ pātraṃ pavitraṃ bhramaṇa-parigataṃ bhaikṣyam akṣayyam annaṃ
GK22bharst_u:1230: vistīrṇaṃ vastram āśā-daśakam acapalaṃ talpam asvalpam urvīm |
GK22bharst_u:1234: tal labdhvāsana-vastra-māna-ghaṭane bhoge ratiṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
GK22bharst_u:1235: bhogaḥ ko 'pi sa eka eva paramo nityoditā jṛmbhane
GK22bharst_u:1236: yat-svādād virasā bhavanti visayās trailokya-rājyādayaḥ || BharSt_3.99*1 ||
GK22bharst_u:1237: mātar medini tāta māruti sakhe tejaḥ subandho jala
GK22bharst_u:1238: bhrātar vyoma nibaddha eṣa bhavatām antyaḥ praṇāmāñjaliḥ |
GK22bharst_u:1241: śayyā śaila-śilā-gṛhaṃ giri-guhā vastraṃ taruṇāṃ tvacaḥ
GK22bharst_u:1242: sāraṅgāḥ suhṛdo nanu kṣiti-ruhāṃ vṛttiḥ phalaiḥ komalaiḥ |
GK22bharst_u:1243: yesāṃ nirjharam ambu-pānam ucitaṃ ratyai tu vidyāṅganā
GK22bharst_u:1244: manye te parameśvarāḥ śirasi yari baddho na sevāñjaliḥ || BharSt_3.100*1 ||
GK22bharst_u:1245: dhairyaṃ yasya pitā kṣamā ca jananī śāntiś ciraṃ gehinī
GK22bharst_u:1246: satyaṃ mitram idaṃ dayā ca bhaginī bhrātā manaḥ-saṃyamaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:1247: śayyā bhūmi-talaṃ diśo 'pi vasanaṃ jñānāmṛtaṃ bhojanaṃ
GK22bharst_u:1248: hy ete yasya kuṭumbino vada sakhe kasmād bhayaṃ yoginaḥ || BharSt_3.100*2 ||
GK22bharst_u:1249: aho vā hāre vā balavati ripau vā suhṛdi vā
GK22bharst_u:1250: maṇau vā loṣṭhe vā kusuma-śayane vā dṛṣadi vā |
GK22bharst_u:1251: tṛṇe vā straiṇe vā mama sama-dṛśo yānti divasāḥ
GK22bharst_u:1252: kvacit puṇyāraṇye śiva śiva śiveti pralapataḥ || BharSt_3.100*3 ||
